XRoar emulator BIOS for the CoCo series - core system initialization

CoCo 3 system ROM - provides 6809 CPU support and enhanced graphics

DOS 1.1 ROM - adds directory listings and larger file support

Double‑sided RSDOS ROM - supports 2‑side floppy media
Plus-style ROM providing the enhanced system firmware used by upgraded CoCo 3 configurations.
Cassette patch - improves BASIC directory display (CAS format)
Audio version of the CCN directory‑display patch (WAV format)
Cassette patch - adds DB‑style directory enhancements
Audio version of the DB directory‑enhancement patch (WAV format)
PC‑88 disk controller BIOS - needed for disk images
Generic disk ROM - base driver used by several CoCo variants
Kickstart v1.2 rev 33.180 for the Amiga 500, an early ROM offering foundational Workbench 1.x support.
Kickstart v1.3 rev 34.005 for the Amiga 500, the most common ROM known for excellent game compatibility.
Kickstart v2.04 rev 37.175 for the Amiga 500+, introducing the updated Workbench 2.x interface and system enhancements.

Kickstart v3.1 rev 40.068 for the Amiga 1200, offering enhanced hardware compatibility and updated ROM modules.
Kickstart v3.1 rev 40.068 for the Amiga 4000, enabling advanced system features and improved AmigaOS 3.x functionality.
CDTV Extended ROM v1.00 for the Commodore CDTV, adding system extensions required for multimedia titles.

CD32 Extended ROM rev 40.060 providing additional system modules used by enhanced CD32 software.
Combined CD32 Kickstart and Extended ROM v3.1 rev 40.060, used by some emulators as an all-in-one CD32 firmware.
JiffyDOS Kernal replacement for the Commodore 64 providing accelerated disk access and enhanced command features.
JiffyDOS firmware for the Commodore 1541-II disk drive enabling high-speed serial communication and improved disk routines.
JiffyDOS enhanced BIOS for the Commodore 1571 drive featuring faster disk operations and advanced dual-sided support.
JiffyDOS custom BIOS for the Commodore 1581 drive offering high-speed transfers and improved directory handling.

ROM for the Macintosh Performa series providing the core firmware for system initialization.
Startup disk image for classic Macintosh systems required to boot the operating system.
ROM used by vMac emulator to replicate classic Macintosh firmware for system boot and compatibility.
